alert.note: Alert for Crook; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 27 at 2:27PM MDT until June 27 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 401 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM MDT /9 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN SOUTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 13 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST SOUTH DAKOTA BUTTE IN SOUTH CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA MELLETTE TODD IN SOUTHWEST SOUTH DAKOTA BENNETT CUSTER FALL RIVER JACKSON OGLALA LAKOTA IN WEST CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA HAAKON LAWRENCE MEADE PENNINGTON ZIEBACH IN WYOMING THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST WYOMING CROOK WESTON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALLEN, BILLSBURG, BUCKHORN, CLARETON, CUSTER, DEADWOOD, DOWNTOWN BELLE FOURCHE, DOWNTOWN NEWCASTLE, DUPREE, EDGEMONT, FAITH, FOUR CORNERS, HERMOSA, HILL CITY, HOT SPRINGS, KADOKA, KIRLEY, KYLE, LACREEK WILDLIFE REFUGE, LEAD, MARTIN, MILESVILLE, MISSION, MOORCROFT, MORRISEY, OGLALA, PHILIP, PINE RIDGE, RAPID CITY, ROCHELLE, ROSEBUD, SAINT FRANCIS, SPEARFISH, STURGIS, SUNDANCE, TUTHILL, UNION CENTER, UPTON, WALL, WHITE RIVER, AND WOOD. THIS INCLUDES THE TRIBAL LANDS OF THE CHEYENNE RIVER RESERVATION, THE PINE RIDGE RESERVATION, AND THE ROSEBUD RESERVATION.
